questions.question_text: What are the available options for Scoring in Document Manager, that apply only to string content type?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
Scoring

Advanced

The measure used to determine accuracy when running evaluations of model predictions. It can only be configured for string content type. All other content types use an Exact Match scoring strategy. Options:

exact match: a prediction is only deemed to be correct (score of 1) if it exactly matches the true value. If it differs by even a single character, then it is deemed to be incorrect (score of 0).
levenshtein: a prediction is deemed to be partially correct according to the Levenshtein distance between the prediction and the true value. If a 10-letter value is predicted correctly, except for the last 2 characters, then the score of that prediction will be 0.8.

choices.D: Exact match and Finite state automation-based search.
choices.A: Exact match and Naive string search.

choices.C: It integrates directly with upstream and downstream processes to control the entire workflow
choices.A: It is decoupled from other connected automations, handling only document processing tasks
choices.D: It supports automatic configuration for each input file processed
choices.B: It processes items in bulk to maximize efficiency

questions.question_text: How does the architecture of the Document Understanding Process template support flexibility in workflow integration?
When using UiPath Communications Mining how can general fields be enabled and configured?

choices.A: By adding them when creating the dataset or later from the dataset settings page
choices.D: By creating a new project or editing an existing project
choices.C: By creating a new data source or editing an existing data source
choices.B: By creating a new model or editing an existing model version

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
Enabling general field extraction and selecting the general fields to extract are confirmed either during the creation of the dataset or via the settings section in the Dataset settings page.

choices.B: Aim for low precision and high recall
choices.C: Aim for a good precision versus recall balance but focus on recall
choices.D: Aim for high precision and low recall
choices.A: Aim for a good precision versus recall balance but focus on precision

questions.question_text: What would be the best approach when setting up an automation leveraging predictions from UiPath Communications Mining, if a customer wanted to catch as many instances of an event as possible?
What components are part of the Document Understanding Process template?

discussion.content: Type in the solution, should be "C. Load Taxonomy, Digitization, Classification, Data Extraction, Data Validation and Export."

choices.D: Load Taxonomy, Digitization, Categorization, Data Validation, and Export.
choices.C: Load Taxonomy, Digitization, Classification, Data Extraction, and Data Validation Export.
choices.A: Import, Classification, Text Extractor, and Data Validation.
choices.B: Load Document, Categorization, Data Extraction, and Validation.
